'''Heated Battle Mode: Automatic Artistry''' is an [[Event]] for [[Genius Invokation TCG]] in [[Version 5.2]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2024/11/22 10:00:00 – 2024/12/16 03:59:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 32 or above
* Complete the Archon Quest "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"
* Complete the World Quest "[[Battlefield of Dice, Cats, and Cards]]"

===Summary===
* After the event starts, Travelers can go to the Invitation Board of The Cat's Tail to participate in "Genius Invokation TCG" duels under the special rules of "Heated Battle Mode."
* The special rule for this edition is: <section begin="special_rule" /><ul><li>Travelers must randomly draw characters and powerful supporting forces to form lineups and do consecutive battles.</li><li>Before each battle, Travelers can play Event Cards or Equipment Cards to further build the characters, or rearrange the order of the Character Cards.</li><li>After the battle begins, characters from both sides will automatically take actions in order from left to right.</li><li>Character Cards now have ATK stats. The higher the character's ATK is, the higher the DMG they deal.</li><li>In this edition of Heated Battle Mode, the effects of certain Elemental reactions and cards will be adjusted.</li></ul><section end="special_rule" />
* Travelers can invite teammates or participate in duels via match-making after reaching Player Level 4.

===Gameplay Notes===
* All players start with Paimon. Before the start of the first, third and fifth duel, you can choose 1 powerful supporting force. Before the start of the second and fourth duel, you can choose 1 character card.
* Before the start of the first, second, third and fifth duel, you can choose 1 artifact card. Before the start of the second to fourth duel, you can choose 1 weapon card. You can choose 1 event card before each duel except the first.
* Before the duel begins, you can see the opponent's characters, but not their order, supporting forces or equipments.
* You always start first in the first round.
* Characters always use their elemental bursts if available.
